script.name: plugin.loadoutm.editmenu
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds' $loadout.id = get global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.id' $loadout.settings = get global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.settings'
$HQ = get player HQ
*write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Debug], fmt='Loadout Maanger, obj=%s, event=%s, data=%s', $a.obj, $a.event, $a.data, null, null
$boolean.settings = table alloc $boolean.settings['notify'] = [TRUE] $boolean.settings['drop.drones'] = [TRUE] $boolean.settings['ignore.blacklist'] = [TRUE] $boolean.settings['property.hidden'] = [TRUE] $boolean.settings['property.favourite'] = [TRUE] $boolean.settings['wingman'] = [TRUE] $boolean.settings['autojump'] = [TRUE] $boolean.settings['emergency.jump'] = [TRUE] $boolean.settings['marine.board'] = [TRUE]
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] $loadout.id = $a.data set global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.id' value=$a.data $loadout.settings = table alloc gosub sub.LoadLoadout set global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.settings' value=$loadout.settings gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Search] gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $menu.id = $a.data[0] $value = $a.data[1] if $menu.id == 'loadout.edit.selectware' $loadout.settings['select.search'] = $value $ware.table = $loadout.settings['select.wares'] $ware.got.table = $loadout.settings['select.got.wares'] gosub sub.SelectWare return $menu else if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.edit.selectcmd' $loadout.settings['selectcmd.search'] = $value gosub sub.SelectTurretCommand return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Context] gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_WARE if $value == 'info' $input = create input: id='info' encyclopedia page, ware=$selection return $input else if $value == 'remove' if is equipment: ware=$selection remove key $selection from table $loadout.equipment gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end else if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_STRING if $selection == 'homebase' if $value == 'info' $tmp = $settings[$selection] $input = create input: id='info' object info page, object=$tmp return $input else if $value == 'change' $read.text = read text: page=1265 id=60 $input = create input: id='homebase', user input=Var/Station/Carrier owned by Player, refobj=null, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input else if $value == 'remove' $settings[$selection] = null gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Selection] $menu.id = $a.data[0] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' gosub sub.RestoreLoadout remove key 'tradebar.ware' from table $loadout.settings remove key 'tradebar.amt' from table $loadout.settings gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.TradeBarCh] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' if not is equipment: ware=$selection $loadout.settings['tradebar.ware'] = $selection $loadout.settings['tradebar.amt'] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Select] gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $turret.id = $selection[1] $laser.id = $selection[2] set global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.turret' value=$turret.id set global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.slot' value=$laser.id gosub sub.SelectWeapon return $input else if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_WARE gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $value = $a.data[3] if is upgrade: ware=$selection $loadout.upgrades[$selection] = $value else if is ammo ware: ware=$selection $loadout.ammo[$selection] = $value else $ware.main = get maintype of ware $selection if $ware.main == [SSTYPE_MISSILE] if not $value remove key $selection from table $loadout.missiles else $loadout.missiles[$selection] = $value end end end play sample [Sound.Success] gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input else if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_STRING if $selection == 'add.equipment' $ware.table = $equipment $ware.got.table = $loadout.equipment gosub sub.SelectWare return $input else if $selection == 'add.missile' $ware.table = $missiles.table $ware.got.table = $loadout.missiles gosub sub.SelectWare return $input else if $selection == 'add.ammo' $ware.table = $ammo.table $ware.got.table = $loadout.ammo gosub sub.SelectWare return $input else if $selection == 'add.resupply' $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3037 $input = create input: id='resupply.ware', user input=Var/Available Ware, refobj=null, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input else if $selection == 'fleet.leader' $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=4746 $input = create input: id=$selection, user input=Var/Ship owned by Player, refobj=null, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input else if $selection == 'wing' $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104004 $input = create input: id=$selection, user input=Var/Wing, refobj=null, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input else if $selection == 'turret.1' OR $selection == 'turret.2' OR $selection == 'turret.3' OR $selection == 'turret.4' OR $selection == 'turret.5' OR $selection == 'turret.6' $settings['select.turret'] = $selection gosub sub.SelectTurretCommand return $input else if $selection == 'homebase' $read.text = read text: page=1265 id=60 $input = create input: id=$selection, user input=Var/Station/Carrier owned by Player, refobj=null, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Switch] gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $selection.id = $selection[1] $selection = $selection[0] if $selection == 'shield' dec $selection.id = if $value > 0 dec $value = $shield = get ware from maintype [SSTYPE_SHIELD] and subtype $value $loadout.shield.array[$selection.id] = $shield else $loadout.shield.array[$selection.id] = null end
else if $selection == 'resupply' gosub sub.GetResupplyValues $value = $values[$value] $resupply[$selection.id] = $value end
else if $boolean.settings[$selection] $settings[$selection] = $value else if $selection == 'emergency.jump.shields' $value = $value * 5 $settings[$selection] = $value else if $selection == 'autojump.fuel' do if $value > 10 $value = 10 + ( ( $value - 10 ) * 5 ) $settings[$selection] = $value else $setting = $settings[$selection] if not is datatype[ $setting ] == DATATYPE_NULL $settings[$selection] = $value end end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Hotkey] gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' OR $menu.id == 'loadout.edit.selectware' OR $menu.id == 'loadoutm.edit.selectcmd' if $selection == 'info' if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_WARE $input = create input: id='info' encyclopedia page, ware=$value return $input else if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_OBJCOMMAND $input = create input: id='info' encyclopedia page, command=$value return $input else if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_STRING if $value == 'turret.1' OR $value == 'turret.2' OR $value == 'turret.3' OR $value == 'turret.4' OR $value == 'turret.5' OR $value == 'turret.6' $setting = $settings[$value] $input = create input: id='info' encyclopedia page, command=$setting return $input end else if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $value2 = $value[0] if $value2 == 'weapons' $turret.id = $value[1] $laser.id = $value[2] $ware = $weapon.loadout[$turret.id][$laser.id] $input = create input: id='info' encyclopedia page, ware=$ware return $input else if $value2 == 'shield' $value = $value[1] $value = $loadout.shield.array[$value] $input = create input: id='info' encyclopedia page, ware=$value return $input end end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Returned] gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' if $selection == 'loadoutm.edit.selectweapon' if $value $turret.id = get global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.turret' $laser.id = get global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.slot' dec $laser.id = $weapon.loadout[$turret.id][$laser.id] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end else if $selection == 'resupply.ware' if $value if not $resupply[$value] $resupply[$value] = 1 gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end else if $selection == 'loadoutm.edit.selectcmd' $turret.id = $settings['select.turret'] if $value == -1 $settings[$turret.id] = COMMAND_NONE else if $value $settings[$turret.id] = $value end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if $selection == 'wing' OR $selection == 'fleet.leader' $settings[$selection] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if $selection == 'homebase' if $value $settings[$selection] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end else if $selection == 'loadout.edit.selectware' if $value if is equipment: ware=$value $loadout.equipment[$value] = [TRUE] else if is ammo ware: ware=$value $loadout.ammo[$value] = 1 else $ware.main = get maintype of ware $value if $ware.main == [SSTYPE_MISSILE] $loadout.missiles[$value] = 1 else $loadout.other[$value] = 1 end end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end end
else if $a.event == 'loadoutm.editmenu' $value = $a.data[2] if $value if $value[0] gosub sub.SaveLoadout return [TRUE] end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] set global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.id' value=null set global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.settings' value=null set global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.slot' value=null set global variable: name='loadoutm.edit.turret' value=null end
return null
sub.SelectTurretCommand: gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $search.filter = $loadout.settings['selectcmd.search'] $menu = create custom menu array
$read.text = get command name: command=COMMAND_NONE add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=-1 add section to custom menu: $menu
$turret.cmds = get all commands: submenu=[CmdMenu.Turret] $size = size of array $turret.cmds $i = 0 while $i < $size $cmd.array = $turret.cmds[$i] $table.cmds = table alloc $j = size of array $cmd.array while $j dec $j = $cmd = $cmd.array[$j] $cmd.upgrade = get command upgrade: command=$cmd if $cmd.upgrade $read.text = get command name: command=$cmd if $search.filter skip if case insensitive string match, is $search.filter in $read.text continue end $table.cmds[$cmd] = $read.text end end $sorted.array = sort table keys by value: table=$table.cmds $j = 0 $cmd.size = size of array $sorted.array while $j < $cmd.size $cmd = $sorted.array[$j] $read.text = $table.cmds[$cmd] $text.cols = array alloc: size=2 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=250 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $read.text = get command short name: command=$cmd $read.text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $read.text, null, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=80 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[1] = $text add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$cmd inc $j = end add section to custom menu: $menu inc $i = end
set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.Identity], id='info' set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE]
$read.text = read text: page=1265 id=101 $input = create input: id='loadoutm.edit.selectcmd' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$loadout.type callback=null endsub
sub.SelectWare: $search.filter = $loadout.settings['select.search'] $loadout.settings['select.wares'] = $ware.table $loadout.settings['select.got.wares'] = $ware.got.table
$menu = create custom menu array
$text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=818 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-70 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102519 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-40 length=30 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[1] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102518 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=40 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[2] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.cols
$drawn = 0 if size of table $ware.table $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$ware.table $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $ware = $sorted.array[$i] inc $i =
if $search.filter $text = sprintf: fmt='%s', $ware, null, null, null, null skip if case insensitive string match, is $search.filter in $text continue end
if not $ware.got.table[$ware] if can shiptype transport ware: shiptype=$loadout.type, ware=$ware inc $drawn = $text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-70 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$ware $text.cols[0] = $text $text = get transport class of ware $ware $text = get short transport class name: class=$text $text = create custom menu column string, position=-40 length=30 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text $ware.vol = get volume of ware $ware if $ware.vol >= 1 if is equipment: ware=$ware $flags = get ware flags: ware=$ware skip if $flags & [WareType.EquipVolume] $ware.vol = 0 end end if $ware.vol >= 1 $text = convert number $ware.vol to string else $text = '-' end $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=40 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text $cargo.free = $ship.cargo - $ship.cargo.used if $ware.vol > $cargo.free set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=[MenuColour.Red] $ret = create menu return value: disabled, id=$ware else $ret = $ware end add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$ret end end end end
set menu option: $menu, icon=61 set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.Identity], id='info' set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE]
if not $drawn $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=819 $input = create input: id='loadout.edit.selectware' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$loadout.type callback=null endsub
sub.CountWareCargo: if is datatype[ $arr ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $amt = 1 $i = size of array $arr while $i dec $i = $ware = $arr[$i] gosub sub.CountWare end else if is datatype[ $arr ] == DATATYPE_TABLE $ware = get next key: table=$arr key=null while $ware $amt = $arr[$ware] gosub sub.CountWare $ware = get next key: table=$arr key=$ware end end endsub
sub.CountWare: if is datatype[ $ware ] == DATATYPE_WARE if is equipment: ware=$ware $flags = get ware flags: ware=$ware if $flags & [WareType.EquipVolume] $ware.vol = get volume of ware $ware $ship.cargo.used = $ship.cargo.used + ( $ware.vol * $amt ) end else $ware.vol = get volume of ware $ware $ship.cargo.used = $ship.cargo.used + ( $ware.vol * $amt ) end end endsub
sub.RestoreLoadout: $loadout.name = $HQ ->get HQ loadout name: id=$loadout.id $loadout.type = $HQ ->get HQ loadout type: id=$loadout.id
$shield.max.count = get max shield number: shiptype=$loadout.type $max.shield.type = get max shield type: shiptype=$loadout.type $ship.cargo = get container size: shiptype=$loadout.type
$shields.array = $loadout.settings['allshields'] $loadout.shield.array = $loadout.settings['shields'] $shield.original.array = $loadout.settings['shield.orig'] $weapon.loadout = $loadout.settings['weapons'] $weapon.loadout.orig = $loadout.settings['weapons.orig'] $upgrades = $loadout.settings['upgrades'] $equipment = $loadout.settings['equipment'] $loadout.upgrades = $loadout.settings['got.upgrades'] $loadout.equipment = $loadout.settings['got.equipment'] $loadout.ammo = $loadout.settings['got.ammo'] $loadout.missiles = $loadout.settings['got.missiles'] $missiles.table = $loadout.settings['missiles'] $tradebar.ware = $loadout.settings['tradebar.ware'] $tradebar.amt = $loadout.settings['tradebar.amt'] skip if $tradebar.amt $tradebar.amt = 0 $settings = $loadout.settings['settings'] $resupply = $loadout.settings['resupply']
$tmp = $loadout.upgrades[Cargo Bay Extension] do if $tmp $ship.cargo = $ship.cargo + $tmp $ship.cargo.used = 0
$ammo.table = table alloc
$arr = $loadout.shield.array gosub sub.CountWareCargo $j = size of array $weapon.loadout while $j dec $j = $arr = $weapon.loadout[$j] gosub sub.CountWareCargo $i = size of array $arr while $i dec $i = $ware = $arr[$i] if is datatype[ $ware ] == DATATYPE_WARE $ammo = get ammunition of laser $ware if $ammo $ammo.table[$ammo] = [TRUE] skip if $loadout.ammo[$ammo] $loadout.ammo[$ammo] = 0 end end end end
$key = get next key: table=$loadout.ammo key=null while $key $ware = $key $key = get next key: table=$loadout.ammo key=$key if not $loadout.ammo[$ware] if not $ammo.table[$ware] remove key $ware from table $loadout.ammo end end end
$arr = get keys: table=$equipment gosub sub.CountWareCargo $arr = $loadout.missiles gosub sub.CountWareCargo $arr = $loadout.ammo gosub sub.CountWareCargo $cargo.free = $ship.cargo - $ship.cargo.used if $cargo.free < 0 $tmp = $loadout.upgrades[Cargo Bay Extension] $tmp = $tmp + ( - $cargo.free ) $loadout.upgrades[Cargo Bay Extension] = $tmp $ship.cargo = $ship.cargo + ( - $cargo.free ) $cargo.free = $ship.cargo - $ship.cargo.used end endsub
sub.LoadLoadout: $loadout.name = $HQ ->get HQ loadout name: id=$loadout.id $loadout.type = $HQ ->get HQ loadout type: id=$loadout.id
$max.shield.type = get max shield type: shiptype=$loadout.type $shield.id = get subtype of ware $max.shield.type inc $shield.id = $shields.array = array alloc: size=$shield.id $shield.max.count = get max shield number: shiptype=$loadout.type $loadout.shield.array = array alloc: size=$shield.max.count $loadout.wares = $HQ ->get HQ loadout wares: id=$loadout.id flags=[Loadout.Shields]
$i = 0 while $shield.id dec $shield.id = $shield = get ware from maintype [SSTYPE_SHIELD] and subtype $shield.id $shields.array[$shield.id] = $shield
$amt = $loadout.wares[$shield] while $amt dec $amt = $loadout.shield.array[$i] = $shield inc $i = do if $loadout.shield.array >= $shield.max.count break end end
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 insert $read.text into array $shields.array at index 0 $loadout.settings['allshields'] = $shields.array $shield.original.array = clone array: $loadout.shield.array $loadout.settings['shield.orig'] = $shield.original.array $loadout.settings['shields'] = $loadout.shield.array
$weapon.loadout = $HQ ->get HQ loadout weapon order: id=$loadout.id $i = size of array $weapon.loadout $weapon.loadout.orig = array alloc: size=$i while $i dec $i = $arr = $weapon.loadout[$i] $arr = clone array: $arr $weapon.loadout.orig[$i] = $arr end $loadout.settings['weapons'] = $weapon.loadout $loadout.settings['weapons.orig'] = $weapon.loadout.orig
$upgrades = table alloc $equipment = table alloc
$i = [SSTYPE_W_ENERGY] while $i <= [SSTYPE_W_TECH] $wares = get known wares by main type: $i, ignore table=null if $wares $ware = get next key: table=$wares key=null while $ware if is upgrade: ware=$ware $upgrades[$ware] = [TRUE] else if is equipment: ware=$ware if $HQ -> trades with ware $ware $equipment[$ware] = [TRUE] end end $ware = get next key: table=$wares key=$ware end end inc $i = end
$loadout.settings['upgrades'] = $upgrades $loadout.settings['equipment'] = $equipment
$loadout.upgrades = $HQ ->get HQ loadout wares: id=$loadout.id flags=[Loadout.Upgrade] $loadout.settings['got.upgrades'] = $loadout.upgrades $loadout.equipment = $HQ ->get HQ loadout wares: id=$loadout.id flags=[Loadout.Equipment] $loadout.settings['got.equipment'] = $loadout.equipment $loadout.ammo = $HQ ->get HQ loadout wares: id=$loadout.id flags=[Loadout.Ammunition] $loadout.settings['got.ammo'] = $loadout.ammo $loadout.missiles = $HQ ->get HQ loadout wares: id=$loadout.id flags=[Loadout.Missiles] $loadout.settings['got.missiles'] = $loadout.missiles $missiles.table = get compatible missile array: shiptype=$loadout.type $missiles.table = convert array to table: $missiles.table, increment=[FALSE] $loadout.settings['missiles'] = $missiles.table
$settings = $HQ ->get HQ loadout settings: id=$loadout.id $settings = clone table $settings $loadout.settings['settings'] = $settings
$resupply = $HQ ->get HQ loadout resupply: id=$loadout.id $resupply = clone table $resupply $loadout.settings['resupply'] = $resupply endsub
sub.AddWaresTable: $ware = get next key: table=$sub.arr key=null while $ware $amt = $sub.arr[$ware] gosub sub.AddLoadoutWare $ware = get next key: table=$sub.arr key=$ware end endsub
sub.AddWaresArray: $amt = 1 $sub.i = size of array $sub.arr while $sub.i dec $sub.i = $ware = $sub.arr[$sub.i] gosub sub.AddLoadoutWare end endsub
sub.AddLoadoutWare: if $ware $sub.amt = $wares[$ware] skip if $sub.amt $sub.amt = 0 $sub.amt = $sub.amt + $amt $wares[$ware] = $sub.amt end endsub
sub.SaveLoadout: gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $flags = [Loadout.Other] $wares = $HQ ->get HQ loadout wares: id=$loadout.id flags=$flags $sub.arr = $loadout.shield.array gosub sub.AddWaresArray $i = size of array $weapon.loadout while $i dec $i = $sub.arr = $weapon.loadout[$i] gosub sub.AddWaresArray end $sub.arr = get keys: table=$loadout.equipment gosub sub.AddWaresArray $sub.arr = $loadout.upgrades gosub sub.AddWaresTable $sub.arr = $loadout.ammo gosub sub.AddWaresTable $sub.arr = $loadout.missiles gosub sub.AddWaresTable
$HQ ->remove HQ loadout: id=$loadout.id $loadout.id = $HQ ->create loadout: shiptype=$loadout.type name=$loadout.name wares=$wares $HQ ->set HQ loadout weapon order: id=$loadout.id weapons=$weapon.loadout $HQ ->set HQ loadout settings: id=$loadout.id, settings table=$settings $key = get next key: table=$resupply key=null while $key $ware = $key $key = get next key: table=$resupply key=$key if not $resupply[$ware] remove key $ware from table $resupply end end $HQ ->set HQ loadout resupply: id=$loadout.id, resupply table=$resupply endsub
sub.AddResupplyToMenu: $text.cols = array alloc: size=2 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-110 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$heading $text.cols[0] = $text $read.text = read text: page=54 id=30 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=60 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[1] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.cols
if $add.new $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$add.new $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3050, $heading, null, null, null, null $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $read.text, null, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret add section to custom menu: $menu end
$sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$ware.table $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $ware = $sorted.array[$i] $amt = $ware.table[$ware] inc $i =
$text.cols = array alloc: size=2 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-110 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$ware $text.cols[0] = $text $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=60 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text
gosub sub.GetResupplyValues $idx = get index of $amt in array $values offset=-1 + 1 if $idx == -1 $idx = 0 end $ret = create new array, arguments='resupply', $ware, null, null, null add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$ware, value array=$values, default=$idx, return id=$ret, width=100 allowtabs=[FALSE] end endsub
sub.GetResupplyValues: $values = array alloc: size=49 $resupply.v = 0 $resupply.a = 0 while $resupply.v <= 10 $values[$resupply.v] = $resupply.a inc $resupply.v = inc $resupply.a = end dec $resupply.a = while $resupply.v <= 48 $resupply.a = $resupply.a + 5 $values[$resupply.v] = $resupply.a inc $resupply.v = end endsub
sub.AddWaresToMenu: $text.cols = array alloc: size=4 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-110 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$heading $text.cols[0] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102519 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-90 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[1] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102518 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-60 length=30 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[2] = $text $read.text = read text: page=54 id=30 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=60 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[3] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.cols
if $add.new $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$add.new $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3050, $heading, null, null, null, null $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $read.text, null, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret add section to custom menu: $menu end $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$ware.table $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $ware = $sorted.array[$i] $amt = $ware.table[$ware] inc $i = $text.cols = array alloc: size=4 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-110 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$ware $text.cols[0] = $text $text = get transport class of ware $ware $text = get short transport class name: class=$text $text = create custom menu column string, position=-90 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text $ware.vol = get volume of ware $ware $text = convert number $ware.vol to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=-60 length=30 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text $text = convert number $amt to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=60 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[3] = $text $used = $ship.cargo.used - ( $amt * $ware.vol ) do if $ware == $tradebar.ware $amt = $tradebar.amt $current = $amt * $ware.vol $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$ware $free = $ship.cargo - $used add trade bar to menu: $menu, text=$text.cols, min=0, max=$free, current=$amt, volume=$ware.vol, used=$used, return value=$ret, left text='%CURRENTVOL%/%MAX%', right text='%CURRENT%' $tradebar.data = get last item in array: $menu $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102510 $tradebar.data = add menu trade bar text: $tradebar.data id=[TradeBarText.InfoLeft] text=$read.text $used = $used + ( $amt * $ware.vol ) $text = convert number $used to string $text2 = convert number $ship.cargo to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s/%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null $tradebar.data = add menu trade bar text: $tradebar.data id=[TradeBarText.NotoLeft] text=$text end endsub
sub.BuildMenu: gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $menu = create custom menu array
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=746 $text = sprintf: fmt='(%s: %s)', $read.text, $max.shield.type, null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=4768 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text
$i = 0 while $i < $shield.max.count $shield = $loadout.shield.array[$i] $orig.shield = $shield.original.array[$i] inc $i = $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=698 $text = sprintf: fmt='%s %s:', $read.text, $i, null, null, null if not $shield $shield.id = 0 else $shield.id = get subtype of ware $shield inc $shield.id = end $ret = create new array, arguments='shield', $i, null, null, null do if $shield != $orig.shield set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=[MenuColour.Bold] add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$shields.array, default=$shield.id, return id=$ret, width=100 allowtabs=[FALSE] end
$turrets = get number of turrets: shiptype=$loadout.type $i = 0 while $i < $turrets $laser.array = get compatible laser array: shiptype=$loadout.type, turret=$i if not $laser.array inc $i = continue end
$text.cols = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.CmdConsole] id=10008 $text = get turret text: shiptype=$loadout.type turret=$i $text = sprintf: fmt='%s: %s', $read.text, $text, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[0] = $text $text = create custom menu string weapon mask: weapons=$laser.array $text = create custom menu column string, position=120 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.cols
$lasers = get laser count: shiptype=$loadout.type turret=$i $j = 0 while $j < $lasers $laser = $weapon.loadout[$i][$j] $laser.orig = $weapon.loadout.orig[$i][$j] inc $j =
$text.cols = array alloc: size=4
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=698 $text = sprintf: fmt='%s: %s', $read.text, $j, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=70 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[0] = $text
if $laser == -1 OR ! $laser $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 $text = create custom menu column string, position=80 length=-1 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[1] = $text $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=$col text=' ' $text.cols[2] = $text $text.cols[3] = $text else *$text = create custom menu string icon: type=[IconType.Weapons], id=1, Y=100 Width=40 Height=20 $text = create custom menu string rect: width=6 y=0 height=12 menu colour=[MenuColour.Black] $text = create custom menu column string, position=80 length=40 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text $laser.colour = get laser colour: laser type=$laser $text = create custom menu string rect: width=4 y=1 height=10 raw colour=$laser.colour $text = create custom menu column string, position=81 length=40 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text if $laser == $laser.orig $col = [MenuColour.Normal] else $col = [MenuColour.Bold] end $text = create custom menu column string, position=95 length=-1 right=[FALSE] colour=$col text=$laser $text.cols[3] = $text end
$ret = create new array, arguments='weapons', $i, $j, null, null $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$ret add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$ret end inc $i = end
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=791 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$upgrades $i = 0 $size = size of array $sorted.array while $i < $size $ware = $sorted.array[$i] $ware.cur = 0 do if $loadout.upgrades $ware.cur = $loadout.upgrades[$ware] inc $i = @ $ware.max = [THIS] -> call script lib.cycrow.getupgrademax : Upgrade=$ware Ship Type=$loadout.type
skip if $ware.cur $ware.cur = 0
$text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$ware $text.cols[0] = $text $percent = ( $ware.cur * 100 ) / $ware.max $text = create custom menu string progress: width=100 progress=$percent% $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text $text = convert number $ware.cur to string $text2 = convert number $ware.max to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s/%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$ware add trade bar to menu: $menu, text=$text.cols, min=0, max=$ware.max, current=$ware.cur, return value=$ret, left text=' ', right text='%CURRENT%/%MAX%' end
$text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=792 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102519 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-40 length=40 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[1] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102518 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=40 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[2] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.cols
$ret = create menu return value: callback, value='add.equipment'
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=792 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3050, $read.text, null, null, null, null $read.text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $read.text, null, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret add section to custom menu: $menu $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$loadout.equipment $i = 0 $size = size of array $sorted.array while $i < $size $ware = $sorted.array[$i] inc $i = $text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$ware $text.cols[0] = $text $text = get transport class of ware $ware $text = get short transport class name: class=$text $text = create custom menu column string, position=-40 length=40 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text if is single equipment: ware=$ware $text = '-' else $text = get volume of ware $ware if $text $text = convert number $text to string else $text = '-' end end $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=40 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text $context = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=812 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=29, returnvalue='info', hotkey=[Key.Identity], disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1107 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=66, returnvalue='remove', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=792 add context menu global info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$ware $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id=$ware, menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$ret end
if size of table $ammo.table $heading = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9203 $add.new = null $ware.table = $loadout.ammo gosub sub.AddWaresToMenu end
$heading = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9113 $add.new = 'add.missile' $ware.table = $loadout.missiles gosub sub.AddWaresToMenu
$heading = read text: page=2005 id=509 *add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$heading $add.new = 'add.resupply' $ware.table = $resupply gosub sub.AddResupplyToMenu
$heading = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104260 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$heading
@ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.getsettings : Ship Type=$loadout.type $order = $ret[0] $settings.width = $ret[1]
$i = 0 $size = size of array $order while $i < $size $setting = $order[$i] inc $i = if not $setting add section to custom menu: $menu else $setting.value = $settings[$setting] @ $text = [THIS] -> call script lib.cycrow.getloadoutsetting : Setting=$setting Value=$setting.value Ship Type=$loadout.type if $text $setting.value.text = $text[1] $text = $text[0]
if $setting == 'homebase' $text = create text for custom menu, left=$text, right=$setting.value.text if $setting.value -> exists $context = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=812 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=29, returnvalue='info', hotkey=[Key.Identity], disabled=[FALSE] add context menu separator: menu=$context $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104482 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=113, returnvalue='change', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1107 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=66, returnvalue='remove', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104477 add context menu global info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$setting.value.text $sector = $setting.value -> get sector $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=715 add context menu global info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$sector $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id=$setting, menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE] else $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$setting end add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret else if $setting == 'fleet.leader' $text = create text for custom menu, left=$text, right=$setting.value.text $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$setting add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret else if $setting == 'formation' $values = array alloc: size=8 $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=10 $values[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=11 $values[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=12 $values[2] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=13 $values[3] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=14 $values[4] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=15 $values[5] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=16 $values[6] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=17 $values[7] = $read.text add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$values, default=$setting.value, return id=$setting, width=60 allowtabs=[FALSE] else if $setting == 'autojump.range' $values = array alloc: size=51 $v = size of array $values while $v dec $v = $read.text = convert number $v to string $values[$v] = $read.text end add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$values, default=$setting.value, return id=$setting, width=60 allowtabs=[FALSE] else if $setting == 'emergency.jump.shields' $values = array alloc: size=0 $v = 0 while $v <= 100 $read.text = sprintf: fmt='%s%%', $v, null, null, null, null append $read.text to array $values $v = $v + 5 end $value = $setting.value / 5 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$values, default=$value, return id=$setting, width=60 allowtabs=[FALSE] else if $setting == 'autojump.fuel' $values = array alloc: size=0 $v = 0 while $v <= 160 $read.text = convert number $v to string append $read.text to array $values if $v < 10 inc $v = else $v = $v + 5 end end
if $setting.value <= 10 $value = $setting.value else $value = 10 + ( ( $setting.value - 10 ) / 5 ) end add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$values, default=$value, return id=$setting, width=60 allowtabs=[FALSE] else if $setting == 'attacked.response' $values = array alloc: size=4 $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=100 $values[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=101 $values[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=102 $values[2] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=2012 id=103 $values[3] = $read.text add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$values, default=$setting.value, return id=$setting, width=60 allowtabs=[FALSE] else if $setting == 'wing' $text.cols = array alloc: size=4 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=150 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[0] = $text if $setting.value -> exists $text = create custom menu string rect: width=60 y=1 height=10 menu colour=[MenuColour.Black] $text = create custom menu column string, position=180 length=60 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text $colour = $setting.value ->get wing raw colour if $colour $text = create custom menu string rect: width=58 y=2 height=8 raw colour=$colour else $colour = $setting.value ->get wing menu colour $text = create custom menu string rect: width=58 y=2 height=8 menu colour=$colour end $text = create custom menu column string, position=181 length=60 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text else $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=80 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=' ' $text.cols[1] = $text $text.cols[2] = $text end $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=80 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$setting.value.text $text.cols[3] = $text $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$setting add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$ret else if $boolean.settings[$setting] $values = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102302 $values[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102301 $values[1] = $read.text add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$values, default=$setting.value, return id=$setting, width=60 allowtabs=[FALSE] else $text = create text for custom menu, left=$text, right=$setting.value.text $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$setting add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret end end end end
$heading = read text: page=$page.id id=3051 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$heading $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=817 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=[TRUE] $read.text = read text: page=1903 id=9 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=[FALSE]
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=4017 $read.text = sprintf: fmt='%s:', $read.text, null, null, null, null $setting.text = $loadout.name gosub sub.AddInfo $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104338 $setting.text = $loadout.type gosub sub.AddInfo $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3052 $setting.text = get transport class: shiptype=$loadout.type gosub sub.AddInfo $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3053 $text = convert number $ship.cargo.used to string $text2 = convert number $ship.cargo to string $setting.text = sprintf: fmt='%s/%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null gosub sub.AddInfo
set menu option: $menu, icon=153 set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.Identity], id='info'
$text = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s)', $loadout.name, $loadout.type, null, null, null $callback = [Callback.Switch] | [Callback.TradeBarCh] | [Callback.Selection] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3051 $input = create input: id='loadoutm.editmenu' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$text callback=$callback endsub
sub.AddInfo: $info.pos = 100 $text.cols = array alloc: size=2 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$info.pos right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $text = create custom menu column string, position=$info.pos length=-1 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$setting.text $text.cols[1] = $text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.cols endsub
sub.SelectWeapon: gosub sub.RestoreLoadout $menu = create custom menu array
$text.cols = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102537 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $lasers = get compatible laser array: shiptype=$loadout.type, turret=$turret.id $text = create custom menu string weapon mask: weapons=$lasers $text = create custom menu column string, position=130 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.cols
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=-1
$lasers = sort array $lasers $i = 0 $size = size of array $lasers while $i < $size $laser = $lasers[$i] inc $i = $laser.colour = get laser colour: laser type=$laser $text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $text = create custom menu string rect: width=6 y=0 height=12 menu colour=[MenuColour.Black] $text = create custom menu column string, position=2 length=40 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[0] = $text $text = create custom menu string rect: width=4 y=1 height=10 raw colour=$laser.colour $text = create custom menu column string, position=3 length=40 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text $text = create custom menu column string, position=25 length=-1 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$laser $text.cols[2] = $text
add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$laser end
set menu option: $menu, icon=63
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.CmdConsole] id=12 $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=698 $text = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s: %s, %s: %s)', $loadout.type, $read.text, $turret.id, $text, $laser.id $input = create input: id='loadoutm.edit.selectweapon' menu=$menu title='Select Laser' description=$text callback=null endsub
return null
